Grokproject tests
=================

Go to a directory::

    >>> cd(tempdir)

Check that the directory does not exist::

    >>> rmdir('grokexample')

Then use paster::

    >>> paster = current_dir + '/bin/paster create -t grok '
    >>> sh(paster + 'grokexample user=a passwd=a --no-interactive')
    /.../bin/paster create -t grok grokexample user=a passwd=a --no-interactive
    ...

Let's check the contents

    >>> package_dir = os.path.join(tempdir, 'grokexample')
    >>> ls(package_dir)
    .installed.cfg
    bin
    bootstrap.py
    buildout.cfg
    develop-eggs
    parts
    setup.py
    src
    versions.cfg

    >>> sofware_dir = os.path.join(package_dir, 'src', 'grokexample')
    >>> ls(sofware_dir)
    __init__.py
    app.py
    app.txt
    app_templates
    configure.zcml
    ftesting.zcml
    static
    tests.py
